'''''ekka''''' means "hole" in [[Quenya]].<ref name=PE17>{{PE|17}}, p. 188</ref>

Petri Tikka has suggested the spelling ''ecca'', to conform with the standard used in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref>Petri Tikka, "[http://www.petritikka.com/elvish/PE17.html Quenya words in Parma Eldalambaron 17]" at [http://www.petritikka.com/elvish/ Men Eldalamb√≠nen] (accessed 4 December 2011)</ref>
